Posts.Content: sheri47 wrote:  well went today for first mammogram dr also ordered an ultrasound. the whole time im getting mammgram tech kept saying she does not know why dr is doing ultrasound. told her i do not know why guess that just the way he does it.  so she did the mammo and said she was going to have radiologist read it so was fine she came back in and said she was calling dr to see why the ultrasound, so i am sitting therewaiting and the more i sat the upsetter i got so i walked out of room and she was talking to dr office i was crying told her i did not understand. if the dr ordered it that they sould not be quisting it  they where there to do test not make decisions about what i should have. she said she had to call and she if there was something spciecic he was looking for  well she only said that after i was extremly upset so  i left crying all the way home , guess im just being to sensitive.  i did call dr and they said they always order ultrasound then if they see something that day on mammo i would not have to have waited to have it  a week later . so partly their fault  does not help me any i am just so emmbarrest for crying about that . thanks all for listing guess i just need to write it somewhere sheri Dx IDC, 2cm, Stage I, Grade 2, 0/5 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
